name: Prose Visual Novel
description:
Welcome to Prose Idols!

We are an original idol group based in the east coast! Along with creating our own songs and choreography, we decided to flesh out our characters in a visual novel game! We will be producing new chapters frequently so stay tuned!

 Please follow our journey on instagram @Prose.idols !

We also have a discord and patreon!

Interested in helping us with the game? Fill out our staff form!
